name: docker-owncloud
tagline: scripts to generate a full owncloud stack with mysql, nginx, letsencrypt ready to use in production
body:
### Welcome to docker-owncloud
This script was inspired by [Json Wilder's Blog](http://jasonwilder.com/blog/2014/03/25/automated-nginx-reverse-proxy-for-docker/) and the examples found here: [https://github.com/fatk/docker-letsencrypt-nginx-proxy-companion-examples](https://github.com/fatk/docker-letsencrypt-nginx-proxy-companion-examples). I was already using docker, owncloud, docker-gen and nginx, but with owncloud and mysql in docker and nginx with docker-get on the host. A full stack solution, with everything in docker, was the next logical step.

### Support or Contact
